ingredients: 1 pound broccoli rabe (rapini; about 1 large bunch)
4 ounces thinly sliced sweet coppa or prosciutto
recipe.title: Pressed Coppa Sandwiches with Broccoli Rabe Pesto

ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf processed cheese food, cubed
recipe.title: Broccoli Cheese Soup

ingredients: 1 small butternut, acorn, or other winter squash, peeled, seeded and cut into tiny chunks
2 slices good brown bread, stale or dried out in the oven
1/2 a small head of broccoli (100 g / 3.5 oz), roughly chopped
4 tablespoons creme fraiche or sour cream
~ 1 3/4 cups / 3.5 oz / 100 g grated white cheddar cheese
~ 1 3/4 cups / 3.5 oz / 100 g grated gruyere cheese
a large handful of (yellow) cherry tomatoes
3 cups / 300 g dried (whole wheat) macaroni elbows
recipe.title: Broccoli-Basil Mac and Cheese

ingredients: 1 clove garlic, minced (or, more to taste)
Freshly ground black pepper or pinches of red pepper flakes
A heap of grated parmesan (about 1/2 cup), to serve
recipe.title: spaghetti with broccoli cream pesto
